mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usedcar(u_no, nickname, userid, passwd, category, deal_way, deal_code, product_code, h_price, purc_date, region, title, content, thumb, file1, size1, file2, size2, file3, size3, file4, size4, file5, size5, email, tel, wdate) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(u_no), 0)+1 as u_no FROM usedcar), #{nickname}, #{userid}, #{passwd}, #{category}, #{deal_way},#{deal_code}, #{product_code}, #{h_price} , #{purc_date},#{region}, #{title},#{content},#{thumb},#{file1},#{size1}, #{file2},#{size2}, #{file3}, #{size3}, #{file4}, #{size4}, #{file5}, #{size5}, #{email},#{tel}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE usedcar SET passwd=#{passwd}, nickname=#{nickname}, title=#{title}, category=#{category}, deal_code=#{deal_code}, region=#{region}, deal_way=#{deal_way}, purc_date=#{purc_date}, content=#{content}, h_price=#{h_price}, product_code=#{product_code}, thumb=#{thumb}, file1=#{file1}, size1=#{size1}, file2=#{file2}, size2=#{size2}, file3=#{file3}, size3=#{size3}, file4=#{file4}, size4=#{size4}, file5=#{file5}, size5=#{size5}, email=#{email} WHERE u_no=#{u_no}
mapper.select: SELECT u_no, nickname, userid, passwd, category, deal_way, deal_code, product_code, h_price, purc_date, region, title, content, thumb, file1, size1, file2, size2, file3, size3, file4, size4, file5, size5, email, tel, wdate FROM usedcar WHERE u_no=#{u_no}
